markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Empty Body](/Feats.aspx?ID=484) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 165 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

</column>

---

You transmute your body into an ethereal form. You gain the [_empty body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=483) ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Empty Body
